extension.name: Kodi NHK World TV plug-in Development Repository

extension.summary: Watch NHK World TV in HD - live stream and on-demand programs
extension.description:
Watch content from https://www3.nhk.or.jp/nhkworld/ in Kodi - including Top-Stories (SD), the on-demand program (HD) and the live stream (HD).
The plugin is optimized for an Internet connection with at least 10 MBIT. The live stream is typically about 4 MBIT but the on-demand programs require 10 MBIT.
Originally based on Misty's Best Of NHK plug-in (https://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=196657) but is optimized (everything HD) for conntent from the NHK World web site.
extension.disclaimer: This plug-in is a fan project and not related in any way to NHK!
